subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Fabian Cancellara seemed to dispel any notions that all bikers are doping (or using elecric bicycles) when he won the prologue of the Tour de Switzerland.
snippet: Fabian Cancellara seemed to dispel any notions that all bikers are doping (or using elecric bicycles) when he won the prologue of the Tour de Switzerland.
